segments.text: Could I have my hair dyed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , which color do you want to dye it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want the latest fashion , can you make some suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now , many girls are dyeing there hair blond .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think that was suit me very well , blond is kind of erratic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think about pink ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . I think it's better to be a natural chinese , with natural chinese hair.Have you got good brand of hair dye ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we have several brands , which one do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First , you need a shampoo , it makes it easier for your hair to be dyed . Let's down your hair in the water , you hair will be fairly clean that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After this dye job , it feels I look younger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You hair is definitely fresh and shiner looking .
segments.speaker: S2
